                                   +----jtelos.TokenAccessedAsAClassException
public class TokenAccessedAsAClassException
extends TelosException
Thrown when a query that is applicable only to a class is done on a token E.g., this exception is thrown when a token is queried for specializations.

See Also:
Individual, Attribute, Proposition

TokenAccessedAsAClassException(String, String)

 public TokenAccessedAsAClassException(String telosName,
                                       String errorMessage)
